wizards.title: Limitless control
wizards.description: Configure and access your application's controls on any platform at any time!

wizards.title: Elite Set Up
wizards.description: Building your app is now as easy as toggling on and off, with on-target outcomes every time!

wizards.title: Your app, your design!
wizards.description: Mint Console offers you a variety of design configurations to choose from, so your app can look as unique and clean as ever.
